LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_HuntsmansMoonPrecursorP: The scent of blood fades, the Huntsman's Moon does not come to pass.
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_FeralWerewolfFactionMis: The feral werewolf faction is missing.
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_FeralWerewolfFactionCan: The feral werewolf faction can't raid here.
LanguageData.Mashed_Bloodmoon_HuntsmansMoonPrecursorA: The Huntsman's Moon is already awakening.
